title: Chapter 2762: Returning The Star Eyes As An Apology (3)
body:
Chapter 2762: Returning The Star Eyes As An Apology (3)

Chapter 2762: Returning the Star Eyes as an Apology (3)

Editor: Nyoi-Bo Studio

“But there are three of them involved!”

“This means that the blood transfusion part will be a huge project. After all, it requires the origin blood to perfectly activate the Origin Lei Family’s Eyes…”

“I can’t handle this! However, I can ask Xuan Wuji to help. I’ll exchange your blood for my little junior sister, and my junior sister’s blood for Lei Shuangxing. As for Lei Shuangxing’s…Uh, throw it away.”

“Are you satisfied now? Apologized? Is everyone happy with this outcome”

Lei Shuangxing almost pulled out his Divine-beating Crutch.

Xuan Wuji, who was far away from the scene, froze. He thought, “What did it have to do with me? I was just watching the show…”

But it had to be said!

Watching such a show up close was an amazing experience!

The information bar popped up as if it had been provoked.

“Suspected, Passive Points +3849.”

“Feared, Passive Points +2666.”

“…”

Yu Zhiwen almost forgot what she wanted to do.

This was how emotions were. Once they were interrupted, they would not be full.

Yu Zhiwen looked down at her locked hands, her pale lips squirmed, and tears flowed out of her eyes. She begged,

“Let go of me…”

“Alright.” Xu Xiaoshou let go of Yu Zhiwen’s hand and neck.

Everyone was stunned and silent.

“Suspected, Passive Points +6689.”

Yu Zhiwen was also petrified.

However, she reacted in an instant.

The ten severed fingers, controlled by the divine path pattern, moved like a Divine Puppet, swiftly reaching for her own eyes once again.

“You still want to do it again?”

Shocked, Xu Xiaoshou hurriedly used his hand to knock the girl’s neck.

The latter’s body went limp and was about to fall to the ground. He picked her up by the waist.

“Uh…”

With such a “sinner” in his arms, Xu Xiaoshou turned around and felt uneasy.

He had clearly decided not to interfere…

Forget it!

It’s all this girl’s fault for being too stupid!

He looked at Lei Shuangxing. “Although she took action without your permission, I think even you don’t want to see her dig…”

Lei Shuangxing opened his mouth and interrupted without any emotion, “Every grievance has its source, and every debt has its owner.”

Then he understood.

Xu Xiaoshou nodded heavily as he thought, “Lei Shuangxing, you’re a real man, you are responsible!”

As he hugged Yu Zhiwen, he suddenly felt a chill at the back of his head. He tilted his head and twitched twice before he looked back at Lei Xi’er.

“Received cold stare, Passive Points +1.”

Lei Xi’er’s eyes were slightly watery.

There was no expression on her face, but the God Devil Eyes were spinning at high speed under her eyes. Black and white mist even splashed out of her pupils.

Her cold gaze moved from Yu Zhiwen’s body to the hand that was holding Yu Zhiwen, and then to Xu Xiaoshou’s face.

She didn’t say anything and just stared coldly into Xu Xiaoshou’s eyes.

It was extremely uncomfortable!

Xu Xiaoshou felt Dao Xuanji wake up behind him. She was secretly poking his back with a needle-like gaze, which made his hair stand on end.

He opened his mouth and was about to speak.

“Heh.” Lei Xi’er’s red lips curled up.

“Huh?” Xu Xiaoshou was like a sensitive muscle that exploded at the slightest touch.

He didn’t even turn his head and threw Yu Zhiwen to Elder Yu, who was about to attack. “Keep an eye on her. Don’t let her do anything stupid again.”

Once the telepathic communication ended, he finally turned around, his back now straightening considerably.

“What was that ‘heh’ for!”

Lei Xi’er did not make any strange sounds.

She raised her eyebrows with a hint of disdain. She turned her face to the side and looked away from Xu Xiaoshou’s fierce face. She glanced at Lei Shuangxing and said,

“I’ve settled the score. It’s time to make a move.”

“Ignored, Passive Points +1.”

For the first time, Xu Xiaoshou felt provoked by a silent gaze.

He accidentally caught a glimpse of the strange expressions of the saints around him, and he immediately felt even more embarrassed.

His face stiffened as he shouted,

“I didn’t do anything!”

“I just stopped something that a normal person would have stopped!”

“Yu…Even if she wants to apologize, it shouldn’t be now, let alone in this way…”

“Heh.”

His sharp teeth and sharp mouth stopped abruptly, and his face turned ashen.

The nine tails behind him stood up, and the pores all over his body opened up like a hedgehog that had exploded!

Of course, he wasn’t going to make a move.

Xu Xiaoshou tried to explain again.

“Pfft.”

At this moment, an extremely faint snicker suddenly came from the back.

It was even more ear-piercing than the saint calamity!

Xu Xiaoshou glared at the source of the voice.

Xuan Wuji covered his mouth with both hands, his expression extremely terrified. He said repeatedly,

“I’m sorry, Lord Shou. Listen to me. Uh, no, in short, it’s not what you think. I’m not laughing…”

Boom!

Before he could finish, Xuan Wuji felt like his head was being grabbed.

A golden giant appeared and lifted him up. After flipping him in the air for two rounds, he smashed him down into the air.

“I’ll make you laugh!!!”

Xuan Wuji’s expression twisted as he lost control of his body.

“Lord Shou! I’m Liu Changqing, I’m Liu Changqing, he went in…Ah, damn it, come out! You’re the one laughing, not me…Ah-”

Everyone’s eyes were attracted by the sudden accident.

After the guy who called himself Liu Changqing fell, the receiver in the void had already dispelled the golden giant and returned to his human appearance.

His expression was indifferent, and there was no trace of embarrassment on his face. He extended his hand forward, his expression elegant and calm.

Yes, no one could make Xu Xiaoshou feel awkward.

If there was…

Time Reversal!

Xu Xiaoshou took out Time Ancestor Shadow Staff and looked at Lei Xi’er from afar.

“Heh.”

Lei Xi’er lowered her eyes and looked away. She couldn’t be bothered with this childish ghost.

When she looked at the other side, the God Devil Eyes suddenly trembled and she opened her eyes.

A sudden change occurred!

She saw people surrounding the Jade Capital City.

The location of Dao Xuanji, which had been temporarily forgotten and contaminated by the Fourth Sword’s ferocious demonic aura.

Although the black devilish energy was still surging…

At this moment, an extremely eye-catching green color flashed inside!
